dy_construction_effort.componentleveltooltip: Labour Force available per turn||This is the amount of Labour you can use per turn to construct siege engines. The amount used will be subtracted from the total Labour Force.

dy_construction_strength.componentleveltooltip: Total labour force||The labour force is used to construct siege engines for use in the upcoming assault. The size of your army determines the amount of labour available during a siege; the larger the army, the more labour is available.

turns_center.componentleveltooltip: Construction turns left||You are currently building this item.
